environment configuration: JDK 1.8

How to run?
Firstly, you should run HW2MainLucene to generate index file and then run HW3Main which can read an input topics file and output the top N retrieved documents.

How to tune miu?
As I known, the effecting of using MIU is to reduce the impact of common and high collection frequency terms on score and enhance the matching of rare words. Because the collection length is very large, MIU*p(w|REF) will not effect result more. After compute the length of documents, I found most documents' have a length less than 500. So, if we set a large miu like 2000 or more than 2000, the term frequency would decrease greatly and  the result would be meaningless.
So, I tune miu to 500 to close the length of documents.

How long it takes?
4 queries search time: 0.7049166666666666 min
